articles.author: Matthew Cappucci
articles.title: A tropical storm will probably form in the Atlantic this weekend - The Washington Post
articles.description: The system could earn the name “Beryl” as it drifts west toward the Caribbean. Forecasters estimate 70 percent odds that the disturbance, currently midway between South America and Africa, will intensify into a tropical depression or storm.
articles.content: The National Hurricane Center is monitoring two areas in the Atlantic for possible tropical development in the days ahead including a system currently over the open Atlantic Ocean thats primed to int… [+3915 chars]

articles.title: India vs England, T20 World Cup Highlights: IND reach final with thumping win - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India vs England, T20 World Cup Semi final Highlights: India took England apart and will face South Africa in their third T20 World Cup final
